DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect carbohydrates blood glucose level , subjective appetite , mood , memory performance 9 14 year old normal weight ( NW ) overweight obese ( OW/OB ) child .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Carbohydrate Consumption Memory Performance Mood Children
DOC.detailed_description: NW OW/OB child , 9-14 year age , participate experiment . The effect 5 different meal ( mash potato , hash brown , French fry , rice , bean match 50g available carbohydrate ) meal skip examine . On six separate morning , one meal meal provide random order upon arrival . Blood glucose , subjective appetite , mood measure baseline , 10 , 30 , 60 , 120 , 180 minute meal consumption . Cognitive performance measure use immediate delay word recall test , two three executive function task 10 , 30 , 60 , 120 , 180 minute meal consumption .
DOC.criteria: 9 14 year age healthy , born term native English speaker take medication allergy potato , rice , bean . normal body weight ( 5th 85th BMI percentile age gender ) OW/OB ( > 85th BMI percentile age gender ) Food sensitivity , allergy , dietary restriction Health , learning , emotional , behaivoural problem Receiving medication
